movies.title: Thomas & Friends: New Friends For Thomas & Other Adventures
movies.plot: It's so busy on the island of Sodor that Sir Topham Hatt needs to bring in some new engines to keep the railway running smoothly. That means new friends and new adventures for Thomas. Climb aboard and meet them all.
movies.simplePlot: It's so busy on the island of Sodor that Sir Topham Hatt needs to bring in some new engines to keep the railway running smoothly. That means new friends and new adventures for Thomas. Climb aboard and meet them all.

biography.bio: Michael Angelis was born on January 18, 1952 in Liverpool, Merseyside, England. He is an actor, known for Thomas & Friends (1984), No Surrender (1985) and The Liver Birds (1969). He is married to Jennifer Khalastchi. He was previously married to Helen Worth.
biography.name: Michael Angelis
